Card.Name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Vine Dryad
Card.RulesText: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flash Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

Card.Name: Bloodbraid Elf
Card.RulesText: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Card.Name: Masticore
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.

Card.Name: Oracle of Mul Daya
Card.RulesText: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library.

Card.Name: Shivan Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Shivan Wurm enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Baneslayer Angel
Card.RulesText: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

Card.Name: Dragonlord Atarka
Card.RulesText: Flying, trample When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.

Card.Name: Reya Dawnbringer
Card.RulesText: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Card.Name: Avenger of Zendikar
Card.RulesText: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

Card.Name: Life from the Loam
Card.RulesText: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Saproling Cluster
Card.RulesText: {1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Any player may activate this ability.

Card.Name: Eladamri's Call
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Vindicate
Card.RulesText: Destroy target permanent.

Card.Name: Recurring Nightmare
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Card.Name: Enduring Renewal
Card.RulesText: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

Card.Name: Pyrokinesis
Card.RulesText: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

Card.Name: Windswept Heath
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Plateau
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)

Card.Name: Taiga
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Card.Name: Scrubland
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)

Card.Name: Savannah
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

Card.Name: Arid Mesa
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Bloodstained Mire
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Verdant Catacombs
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Mishra's Factory
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Mutavault
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
